title: Singed no buff, or nerf in over a year
body: Think by now every single champion has been buffed, nerfed then buffed or changed but Singed still sits all alone

replies.body: Let's not forget there's been plenty of indirect buffs. The change to **Ghost **{{summoner:6}} was huge for him.

That's because hes in a pretty good state at the moment.

Hi singed main yellowbrickroad here to tell you your favourite champion to play the sonic X themesong to while you barrel down a lane is in a healthy state and requires no buffs or nerfs.

Although personally i wouldn't mind some slight changes to the kit to make it more interactive so id play him again instead of benching him this season.

There are so many champs who haven't been touched for just as long.

Hell Heimer since 4.20 is probably the longest current no changes champion.
